description: Details required for Condition 19 (Finished Floor Levels), Condition 20 (Details of the Extra Flood Resistance and Resilience Measures), Condition 22 (Management Plan for SUDS Pump) and Condition 30 (Details of the flood void) of planning permission 23/01707/FUL (Demolition of existing building and outbuilding, and erection of a new four storey building housing a mix of 7 dwellings with associated refuse and cycle provision.)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT
VALUER Type: VALUERSDescription: Corporate Property Portfolio

decision_conditions: Given that no new drainage layout has been submitted to demonstrate that the proposed SUDs system can be managed without the need for pumping and no updated management plan  has been provided   to provide the details of  management company responsible for the maintenance for all drainage components,  the application fails  to comply with the requirements of condition 22. On this basis the proposal the proposal fails to demonstrate compliance  with policy SI13 of the London Plan 2021, the Sustainable Design and Construction SPG 2014, the Non-Statutory Technical Standards for Sustainable Drainage Systems 2015 and policy DM4 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
